item.title: Brutal killings of young women leave Argentina in shock and anger
item.description: Thousands march demanding justice for three victims whose murders were livestreamed on social media.

item.title: Iran warned not to escalate tensions as UN sanctions reimposed
item.description: The UK, France and Germany say restrictions are back in place over concerns about Iran's nuclear programme.

item.title: The US navy killed 17 in deadly strikes. Now Venezuela is giving civilians guns
item.description: Tensions between the two countries have increased after the US Navy targeted boats off the coast of Venezuela.

item.title: Swiss vote on electronic identity cards for second time
item.description: The proposal was revised after voters rejected the idea in 2021 amid concerns over data protection.

item.title: Instagram vs reality: Bali is becoming a victim of its own success
item.description: Millions flock to Bali to Eat, Pray, Love. They also get crowds, traffic and the cacophony of construction.
